content: I've never had any issues with motion sickness, and I've found that I can get really engrossed in my book during my commute. In fact, I've almost missed my stop a few times because I was so caught up in the story! As for transitioning into a more relaxed state of mind, I think reading during my commute actually helps me prepare for the day ahead. It's a great way for me to clear my mind and get focused before I start my work.
